short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that reverts PCR to its original state, where assignments do not show up repeatedly throughout the week.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is a temporary fix to the recent (4/24/2015) change in Harker's PCR system. Note that the extension doesn't work on month view.
